About Now Work

Wedding Invitation Design

July 02, 2015

A few months ago I undertook the important task of designing Wedding Invitations for my sister and her now husband. (woo weddings!)

I delved into what I needed to know to make it.

  • Theme: We know it's weddings.
  • Theme 2.0: What style of wedding?

From knowing Theme 2.0 we can already start to throw in ideas.

Although, I am lucky to have a sister who's upfront with what she wants. She wanted the invitations to be like Boarding Passes.

*Begins the research into boarding passes.

Here's what I made.
